title: Ahrefs Certification: What To Expect and How It Works
description: Unlock your Ahrefs Certification! Learn to navigate Ahrefs like a pro and drive meaningful SEO and marketing results.
content: Andrei Țiț Showing you how to make the most out of Ahrefs. Mostly through: how-to videos, product updates, webinars, and brochures. Get the week's best marketing content Email Subscription Subscribe Leave this field empty if you're human: Contents You read that right – it’s time to brush up your Ahrefs skills and get certified! We’re excited to announce our upcoming Ahrefs Certification!The course packs 62 lessons into just 3 hours and 30 minutes of learning time, with each lesson covering important Ahrefs reports and actionable use cases that will help you score meaningful SEO and marketing wins.How it worksThe course is geared primarily towards marketers who want to use Ahrefs to succeed at any SEO and marketing task.This means anyone can follow the course, including non-Ahrefs users. However, only logged-in users can take the final exam and have a completion certificate issued in their name.ExamThe final exam consists of:Several questions grouped by the course’s modulesA time limitA limited number of attempts to pass it (which will reset after several days)A minimum threshold score to passCertificateIf you pass the exam, you’ll get a personal certificate of completion valid for 1 year.You can then further save it as PDF, print it, or share it on social media to boost your skills and career opportunities.NOTE If you’re on a paid account, your certificate will have a special design for extra credibility and recognition.If you don’t pass on you first try, don’t worry – you’ll have up to 3 attempts within 15 days. It might be a good idea to brush up on our training material before your next attempt!Get Ahrefs certifiedSo what are you waiting for?While we prepare to launch it, take the How to use Ahrefs course and brush up your Ahrefs knowledge in advance.
